SEARCH
Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing.table

Class GuiSwingTableColumnFilePath

java.lang.Object
org.autogui.swing.table.GuiSwingTableColumnFilePath
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiSwingElement, GuiSwingTableColumn
public class GuiSwingTableColumnFilePath extends Object implements GuiSwingTableColumn
a column factory for File or Path.

both editor and renderer are realized by a subclass of GuiSwingViewFilePathField.PropertyFilePathPane.
